root.name: Electrician
root.description: OverviewBased on an older Atari game by Synapse Software, Electrician has the player control a professional electrician as he rewires all the buildings in a city that has just suffered a complete blackout.GameplayThe player must attach live wires to every loose wire around a room to relight it and once all the rooms are lit, they are free to move onto the next stage. While wiring up rooms, the electrician must be wary of various vermin inside the walls as well as burglars that will occasionally emerge from a newly-lit room.The game has an adjustable difficulty setting (actually the speed at which enemies move) and an "overworld", in which the electrician must move from one building to the next.
